name: People in Extreme and Catastrophic Need
description:
--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Asem Alshbatat [shbatat@un.org]
Sent: 8/18/2022, 6:43 PM
To: submit@reliefweb.int; reliefweb@un.org
Cc: sinnokrot@un.org; shresthan@un.org
Subject: outdated figures for Syria crisis

Dear Relief web team,

Thanks for amazing continuing support,

I would like to ask for updating the figures in below image in the following link on reliefweb  https://reliefweb.int/country/syr,

With the following figures from latest HNO 2022 in the following link  “also you see the updated figures below” https://www.humanitarianresponse.info/sites/www.humanitarianresponse.info/files/documents/files/hno_2022_rev-1.15.pdf

People in Need

14,560,823 [link](https://hum-insight.info/plan/1088)

People Targeted for Assistance

11,840,486 [link](https://hum-insight.info/plan/1088)

Registered Syrian Refugees in the Region

5,607,797 [link](https://data.unhcr.org/en/situations/syria)

People in Acute Need

4,936,136 [link](https://www.humanitarianresponse.info/sites/www.humanitarianresponse.info/files/documents/files/hno_2022_rev-1.15.pdf)

Children in Need

6.5 million [link](https://www.humanitarianresponse.info/sites/www.humanitarianresponse.info/files/documents/files/hno_2022_rev-1.15.pdf) "page 24"

Syrian Refugees in Turkey

3,651,428 [link](https://data.unhcr.org/en/situations/syria)

name: Registered Syrian Refugees in the Region
Total Attacks on Health Care (per year)
Attacks on Health Care: Killed (per year)
Attacks on Health Care: Injured (per year)
People Received WFP Food Assistance (per month)
New Displacements by Conflict & Violence (per year)
